title: Functional Anaylsis chapter 1 definitions and theorems
snippet: Theorem 1.2.7 (Hölder’s inequality) Let \(p&gt;1,q&gt;1\) and \(\frac{1}{p}+\frac{1}{q}=1\). If \((x_n) \in l^p\) and \((y_n) \in l^q\), then\[(\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}|x_n y_n|^p)^{\frac{1}{p}} \le (\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}|x_n|^p)^{\frac{1}{p}} (\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}|y_n|^q)^{\frac{1}{q}}\]Theorem...
